14 US plans a $500 million base near Gaza border, Israeli sources say. According to Israeli officials, the planned US base would house several thousand troops tasked with maintaining the cease-fire between Israel and Hamas. (www.shomrim.news) posted 9 hours ago by Eruditio 10 comments award share report block Shomrim - Exclusive: The United States Plans to Establish a Large Military Base on the Gaza Border US plans a $500 million base near Gaza border, Israeli sources say. According to Israeli officials, the planned US base would house several thousand troops tasked with maintaining the cease-fire between Israel and Hamas; the move signals Washington’s deter... www.shomrim.news
